## Welcome {.mt-4}

Welcome to my blog, where I share my thoughts and insights on **physics**, **mathematics**, and **philosophy**. \
You're welcome to subscribe to my posts via [RSS](posts.xml), and feel free to reach out via [email](mailto:y.zhao.phys@gmail.com) to discuss ideas or share your feedback.\
Detailed copyright information can be found in the [credits](credits.qmd) page.
